mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_BSSGMT (BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, REPORTFLAG) values (#{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfSurcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CustomerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into PBCRS_REPORT_BSSGMTM (BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE) select BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE from PBCRS_REPORT_BSSGMT where BSSGMTSEQNO = #{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_BSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFSURCCODE = #{InfSurcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CIMOC = #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMERTYPE = #{CustomerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEL = #{IsDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BSSGMTSEQNO = #{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, REPORTFLAG,ISDEL,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE from PBCRS_REPORT_BSSGMT where BSSGMTSEQNO = #{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, REPORTFLAG,ISDEL from PBCRS_REPORT_BSSGMT
